verbs.description: Melania Trump [V: is] making headlines over her apparent refusal to hold the president 's hand .
[ARG0: Melania Trump] is [V: making] [ARG1: headlines] [ARGM-CAU: over her apparent refusal to hold the president 's hand] .
[ARG0: Melania Trump] is making headlines over her apparent refusal to [V: hold] [ARG1: the president 's hand] .
